ai-tha-ap317:0.3_0: Hearing this flower, with senior monks,
ai-tha-ap317:1.3_0: not far from the tried to travel,
ai-tha-ap317:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap317:3.1_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
ai-tha-ap317:3.2_0: I was born of a brahmin,
ai-tha-ap317:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap317:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap317:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Roja.
ai-tha-ap317:8.1_0: flowers, food with flax, and fifth.
